title: OSM Based Planetariums Dataset
description: Schema for planetariums_with_population_and_regions_FINAL_FORMATTED.csv â€“ a global list of planetarium venues enriched with population and regional context.

id.description: Stable unique identifier for the venue (slug or code).

name.description: Canonical name of the planetarium venue.

type.description: Type/classification of the venue if specified, e.g. "Fulldome", "Science Centre Planetarium".

format.description: Primary format or technology of the venue, e.g. "Fulldome", "LED dome", "Hybrid immersive theatre".

tagged_as_planetarium.description: True if the venue is explicitly tagged in OSM as a planetarium; false or null if inferred.

latitude.description: Latitude of the venue in WGS84 decimal degrees.

longitude.description: Longitude of the venue in WGS84 decimal degrees.

world_region.description: Macro world region category, e.g. "Europe", "Asia-Pacific", "Latin America", "MENA", "North America".

population.description: Population of the city or metro area where the venue is located, if available.

region_population.description: Population of the wider region or administrative area, if available.

status_active.description: True if the venue is currently operational; false if closed or inactive.

source.description: Primary source from which the venue entry was derived, e.g. "OpenStreetMap Overpass".

source_url.description: URL for the venue official website or primary data source used.

last_verified.description: Date of the last manual verification of the venue data (YYYY-MM-DD).

notes.description: Free-text notes on the entry, e.g. verification issues, historical context.
